# Deezer Music App
## _Tech test for the music app album_

[![N|Solid](data:image/png;base64,)](https://nodesource.com/products/nsolid)

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/joemccann/dillinger.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/joemccann/dillinger)

Deezer music app test its an application test developed using jetpackcompose and the clean archicteture. Here the basic stack of the project:

- JetpackCompose
- Accompanist
- Courotines
- Flows
- Koin
- Kotlinx
- Ktor
- Jetpackcompose navigation
- Api min 21 (limitation related to jetpackcompose lib)


## Features

- The list of albums in the main page
- When an album is selected we have a navigation to another screen with the album detail
- Album detail screen with the cover album image, title, release date and artist
- List of contributors and genres in the album detail screen
- List of tracks for the current album with a bottomsheet modal
- Player [not enabled yet] when you select a track you can see the current track in the player

## Archicteture
Clean arch and MVVM
### Project tree
- App
  -- navigation
- presentation
  -- home
  -- albumdetail
  -- ui
  -- route
- core
  -- domain
  -- data
  -- usecase

## Test Core

The test core implementation is in progress. I'm trying setup the courotines tests with my arch using koin and test all states flows.

#### Test screen
The jetpackcompose test ti this app is in progress. Test using jetpackcompose is early and I'm studying how implement that propertly.
As [John Gruber] writes on the [Markdown site][df1]

## Installation

Just clone the repo or unzip the file

Install the last version of the Android Studio artic fox
